mapper.insert: insert into review values( review_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{cno}, #{rating}, #{re_content}, sysdate, 'n' )
mapper.select: select count(*) from review where cno = #{cno} and re_del = 'n'
select * from ( select a.*, rowNum rn from ( select * from review where cno = #{cno} and re_del = 'n' ) a ) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select nvl(avg(rating),0) from review where cno = #{cno} and re_del= 'n'
mapper.update: update review set re_del = 'y' where re_no = #{re_no}
